casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Dante Lorenzo ROSS No. 247P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Kirby H. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, For Ross, Dante Lorenzo Anne J. Brown, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of June 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
